original_text: As they sat down to eat their meal, they looked up and saw a caravan of Ishmaelites coming from Gilead. Their camels were loaded with spices, balm and myrrh, and they were on their way to take them down to Egypt.
korean_text: 그들이 앉아 음식을 먹다가 눈을 들어 본즉 한 무리의 이스마엘 사람들이 길르앗에서 오는데 그 낙타들에 향품과 유향과 몰약을 싣고 애굽으로 내려가는지라

sentences.original_text: As they sat down to eat their meal
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 식사를 하기 위해 앉았을 때

sentences.original_text: and saw a caravan of Ishmaelites
Their camels were loaded with spices
and they were on their way
to take them down to Egypt
